Manny Calonzo bụ onye na-akwado gburugburu ebe obibi. Enyemaka sitere na Njikọ Ecological Waste Coalition nke Philippines (EcoWaste)  - nke ọ jere ozi dị ka onye bụbu onye isi ala na onye ndụmọdụ - ọ bụ ya kpatara iwu gọọmentị Philippine iji machibido agba agba (na-ejedebe na 85)  % agba agbaziri agbaziri ebe ahụ kemgbe 2017 uhie na mba niile (na-agwụcha na 85% na-acha ọkụ n'ebe ahụ kemgbe afọ 2017) na ịmepụta mmemme asambodo nke atọ maka ndị na-emepụta ágbá. Mgbalị mgbochi nsị ya gbasaa na ihe ndị ọzọ dị na akpụkpọ ụkwụ nke nwere ike belata ọmụmụ n'ime ụmụ nwoke ma merụọ ụmụ ọhụrụ ahụ. N'afọ 2018 ọ bụ otu n'ime mmadụ asaa meriri na Goldman Environmental Prize nke mba ụwa afọ iri mgbe ọ malitere mkpọsa mba ya nke mere ka e chebe ọtụtụ nde ụmụaka Filipino. Calonzo bụ onye ndụmọdụ na Global Lead Paint Elimination Campaign na International Persistent Organic Pollutants Elimination Network.
